TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DebuggerDisplayAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class DebuggerDisplayAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class DebuggerDisplayAttribute sealed : Attribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Struct | System.AttributeTargets.Enum | System.AttributeTargets.Property | System.AttributeTargets.Field | System.AttributeTargets.Delegate, AllowMultiple=true)

summary.span: 确定类或字段在调试器变量窗口中的显示方式。

span.span: Determines how a class or field is displayed in the debugger variable windows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数有一个参数，此参数是一个字符串，将在类型实例的值列中显示。The constructor has a single argument: a string to be displayed in the value column for instances of the type. 此字符串可以包含大括号（{ 和 }）。This string can contain braces ({ and }). 一对大括号内的文本会评估为字段、 属性或方法的名称。The text within a pair of braces is evaluated as the name of a field, property, or method. 例如，选择加号 (+) 以展开 `MyHashtable` 实例的调试器显示时，以下 C# 代码将显示“Count = 4”。For example, the following C# code causes "Count = 4" to be displayed when the plus sign (+) is selected to expand the debugger display for an instance of `MyHashtable`. ```csharp [DebuggerDisplay("Count = {count}")] class MyHashtable { public int count = 4; } ``` 在 Visual Studio 中使用此属性的信息，请参阅[使用 DebuggerDisplay 特性](/visualstudio/debugger/using-the-debuggerdisplay-attribute)。For information about using this attribute in Visual Studio, see [Using the DebuggerDisplay Attribute](/visualstudio/debugger/using-the-debuggerdisplay-attribute). ## Examples 在 Visual Studio 以查看结果的应用中查看下面的示例。View the following example in Visual Studio to see the results of applying the . [!code-cpp[System.Diagnostics.DebuggerBrowsableAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.DebuggerBrowsableAttribute/cpp/program.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.DebuggerBrowsableAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.DebuggerBrowsableAttribute/CS/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.DebuggerBrowsableAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.DebuggerBrowsableAttribute/VB/module1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string value) cil managed

param.name: value
param.span: 要在值列中为该类型的实例显示的字符串；空字符串 ("") 将使值列隐藏。

span.span: The string to be displayed in the value column for instances of the type; an empty string ("") causes the value column to be hidden.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `value`参数可以包含大括号 （{和}）。The `value` parameter can contain braces ({ and }). 一对大括号内的文本会评估为字段、 属性或方法的名称。The text within a pair of braces is evaluated as the name of a field, property, or method. 例如，选择加号 (+) 以展开 `MyTable` 实例的调试器显示时，以下 C# 代码将显示“Count = 4”。For example, the following C# code causes "Count = 4" to be displayed when the plus sign (+) is selected to expand the debugger display for an instance of `MyTable`. ```csharp [DebuggerDisplay("Count = {count}")] class MyTable { public int count = 4; } ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例会导致的值属性从继承类加号 （+） 选择展开调试器显示的实例时要显示`MyHashtable`。The following code example causes the value of the property from the inherited class to be displayed when the plus sign (+) is selected to expand the debugger display for an instance of `MyHashtable`. 你必须运行完整的示例，其中中提供类，以查看结果。You must run the complete example, which is provided in the class, to see the results. [!code-cpp[System.Diagnostics.DebuggerBrowsableAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.DebuggerBrowsableAttribute/cpp/program.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.DebuggerBrowsableAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.DebuggerBrowsableAttribute/CS/program.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.DebuggerBrowsableAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.DebuggerBrowsableAttribute/VB/module1.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要在调试器的变量窗口中显示的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name to display in the debugger variable windows.

value.span: 要在调试器的变量窗口中显示的名称。

span.span: The name to display in the debugger variable windows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该值只能包含大括号 （{和}）。The value can contain curly braces ({ and }). 一对大括号中的文本会评估为字段、 属性或方法的名称。Text within a pair of braces is evaluated as the name of a field, property, or method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例会导致的名称和每个键在调试器变量窗口中显示的值。The following code example causes the name and value of each key to be displayed in the debugger variable windows. 不应用该特性，显示的索引和值类型 (例如:"[0] {KeyValuePairs}")。When the attribute is not applied, the index and value type are displayed (for example: "[0] {KeyValuePairs}"). 应用了该属性，将显示密钥和其值的名称 (例如，如果第一个键为"one"，其值是 1，则显示为:"一个 1")。When the attribute is applied, the name of the key and its value are displayed (for example, if the first key is "one" and its value is 1, the display is: "one 1"). 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Diagnostics.DebuggerBrowsableAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.DebuggerBrowsableAttribute/cpp/program.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.DebuggerBrowsableAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.DebuggerBrowsableAttribute/CS/program.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.DebuggerBrowsableAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.DebuggerBrowsableAttribute/VB/module1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Type ^ Target { Type ^ get(); void set(Type ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置该属性的目标类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of the attribute's target.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性时程序集级别使用该属性指定目标类型。Use this property to specify the target type when the attribute is used at the assembly level.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TargetTypeName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

span.span: Gets or sets the type name of the attribute's target.

value.span: 该属性的目标类型的名称。

span.span: The name of the attribute's target type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性时程序集级别使用该属性指定目标类型的名称。Use this property to specify the name of the target type when the attribute is used at the assembly level.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Type { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要在调试器的变量窗口的类型列中显示的字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the string to display in the type column of the debugger variable windows.

value.span: 要在调试器的变量窗口的类型列中显示的字符串。

span.span: The string to display in the type column of the debugger variable windows.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Value As String
public: property System::String ^ Value { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取要在调试器变量窗口的值列中显示的字符串。

span.span: Gets the string to display in the value column of the debugger variable windows.

value.span: 要在调试器变量窗口的值列中显示的字符串。

span.span: The string to display in the value column of the debugger variable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性包含传入的字符串`value`构造函数的参数。This property contains the string passed in by the `value` parameter of the constructor.
